programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Kevin Smith and Jason Mewes are back! But this time, the Degrassi gang ventures to L.A.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Kevin Smith and Jason Mewes are back!

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Mia is offered a MAJOR modeling contract in Paris, Peter decides he’ll go with her. But he soon realizes he doesn’t fit into her sophisticated world.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After Peter discovers his recreational drug was not-so-recreational meth, he swears he’ll never touch the stuff again. But with the reality of coming down, Peter realizes he just wants more.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s Club Fair Day and Alli and Clare sign up for the Photography Club. Watch out Annie Leibovitz! Everyone who’s anyone is getting involved in something – except Johnny.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jane and Spinner have been through so much together. They’re best friends. Jane’s just come out of a difficult year at home, so hanging out with Spinner is safe and… easy. That’s not a bad thing, right?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Alli insists she’s done with Johnny. When she breaks into his locker to steal nude photos of herself back, she in fact realizes that she’s so not over him.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jane and Holly J team up for a practicum business assignment and immediately bond over their idea to start a babysitting agency.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Riley’s having a great semester. He’s even taking lifeguard training to prepare for a summer job. But when Riley’s close attention to cute lifeguard leader Sam lands him in an uncomfortable situation – like, have-to-jump-in-the-pool-to-disguise-it uncomfortable - he becomes the object of a lot of teasing. Especially when everyone learns Sam is gay – and proud.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: News travels fast about Riley and Sam’s big fight. Riley doesn’t think much of it – until rumours start spreading that Sam was gay-bashed.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: Waiting For A Girl Like You (aka Love Games - US)
programme.desc: It’s Matchmaker week at Degrassi and Declan’s not interested in a serious relationship. The Diplomat brat is here for a good time, not a long time.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Against all odds, Holly J has fallen for Declan. Suddenly she gets what everyone’s been so excited about for so long.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: KC’s living the high school dream. The basketball team made it to the provincial finals, the Sports Awards Gala is coming up, and he finally has a mentor who gets him – Coach Carson.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: KC’s life is on the fast track. With the final basketball game approaching, pressure is at an all time high and Coach Carson has really taken KC under his wing.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma and Kelly make a pit stop at Degrassi while on their Cross Country Bike Adventure raising awareness for their Re-Cycle project. Combining the great outdoors with her sexy boyfriend, Emma’s convinced she’s destined for the best summer ever.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s been a tough year for Peter. Mia’s departure, a brief meth problem, and the serious downgrade from lead singer to roadie.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: Why Can't This Be Love? Pt. 1
programme.desc: Sav and Anya have been planning for their Spring Formal for as long as they can remember. It’s going to be magical.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: Why Can't This Be Love? Pt 2
programme.desc: Anya is more determined than ever to convince Sav they should be together – even if he is bringing family-friend, and arranged-marriage-bride Farrah to the Spring Formal.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Post-KC, Clare’s social life consists of building props for Declan’s musical and reading every book in the “Fortnight” vampire series. But when Clare has a sexy vampire dream about Declan, she’s shocked by her inner fantasy life.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Riley’s completed anger management and has been named ‘Degrassi’s most eligible bachelor’. He’s been keeping his true feelings about guys under wraps – but he’s not sure he wants to anymore. When cute guy Zane piques Riley’s interest, Riley can’t help but want to hang out with him.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Holly J and Declan are closer than ever. They’ve made it through the year, Holly J’s applied for internships all over the city, and with exams almost done, all they need to worry about is Declan’s musical.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Later, High School. Hello New York City! In THE REST OF MY LIFE, Degrassi grads and friends dive into the summer that will change their lives forever. And what’s summer without a little romance – or a wedding...

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Later, High School. Hello New York City! In THE REST OF MY LIFE, Degrassi grads and friends dive into the summer that will change their lives forever. And what’s summer without a little romance – or a wedding...

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Later, High School. Hello New York City! In THE REST OF MY LIFE, Degrassi grads and friends dive into the summer that will change their lives forever. And what’s summer without a little romance – or a wedding...

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Later, High School. Hello New York City! In THE REST OF MY LIFE, Degrassi grads and friends dive into the summer that will change their lives forever. And what’s summer without a little romance – or a wedding...

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Fiona returns from the Hamptons smiling and arm-in-arm with Bobby, her first real boyfriend. Cute and from a well-connected family, they seem to be the perfect match.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Fiona returns from the Hamptons smiling and arm-in-arm with Bobby, her first real boyfriend. Cute and from a well-connected family, they seem to be the perfect match.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Fiona escapes her abusive relationship by fleeing to Degrassi. But when Fiona enhances photos of her black eye to expose Bobby’s abuse, her friends and family question if she’s telling the truth.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Fiona escapes her abusive relationship by fleeing to Degrassi. But when Fiona enhances photos of her black eye to expose Bobby’s abuse, her friends and family question if she’s telling the truth.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Riley will do anything to secure the QB position on the football team: train hard, psych out the competition, and, of course, keep himself closeted. But when his main rival, Drew, fights back by threatening to “out” him, Riley is forced to take matters into his own hands.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Riley will do anything to secure the QB position on the football team: train hard, psych out the competition, and, of course, keep himself closeted. But when his main rival, Drew, fights back by threatening to “out” him, Riley is forced to take matters into his own hands.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Life is good for KC until his mom shows up to win back custody. When his BFs give him grief about allowing her a second chance, he starts hanging with a tougher crowd.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Life is good for KC until his mom shows up to win back custody. When his BFs give him grief about allowing her a second chance, he starts hanging with a tougher crowd.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: I Just Don't Know What To Do With Myself, Pt. 1
programme.desc: When Sav’s parents won’t let him go to an out of town concert, Sav sets out to show his parents that he is responsible. But when they still refuse, Sav makes a decision that might cost him his parents’ trust for good.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: I Just Don't Know What To Do With Myself, Pt. 2
programme.desc: When Sav’s parents won’t let him go to an out of town concert, Sav sets out to show his parents that he is responsible. But when they still refuse, Sav makes a decision that might cost him his parents’ trust for good.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Holly J doesn’t have the time or money to spend a weekend in New York, Declan shows up at Degrassi. But when their time together is burdened by Holly J’s responsibilities, Declan throws money at the problem.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Holly J doesn’t have the time or money to spend a weekend in New York, Declan shows up at Degrassi. But when their time together is burdened by Holly J’s responsibilities, Declan throws money at the problem.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: You Don't Know My Name, Pt. 1
programme.desc: Alli wants to be Drew’s girlfriend. Her plan? Become indispensible. But when that doesn’t stop him from pursuing other girls, she walks away. Drew starts missing his bubbly Bhandari so he decides to give her what she wants... For now.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: You Don't Know My Name, Pt. 2
programme.desc: Alli wants to be Drew’s girlfriend. Her plan? Become indispensible. But when that doesn’t stop him from pursuing other girls, she walks away. Drew starts missing his bubbly Bhandari so he decides to give her what she wants... For now.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: My Body Is A Cage, Pt. 1
programme.desc: Adam wants to be one of the guys. But when news breaks he’s transgender, that becomes impossible. As life at Degrassi worsens, friends and family don’t understand why he doesn’t just live as a girl.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: My Body Is A Cage, Pt. 2
programme.desc: Adam wants to be one of the guys. But when news breaks he’s transgender, that becomes impossible. As life at Degrassi worsens, friends and family don’t understand why he doesn’t just live as a girl.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: Tears Dry On Their Own, Pt. 1
programme.desc: Jenna vows to stop at nothing to try out for the reality show The Next Teen Star. She overcomes nerves and relationship bumps with KC to audition… and scores a gold ticket

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: Tears Dry On Their Own, Pt. 2
programme.desc: Jenna vows to stop at nothing to try out for the reality show The Next Teen Star. She overcomes nerves and relationship bumps with KC to audition… and scores a gold ticket

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Riley will do anything to win Zane back. But when he violently overreacts to homophobic comments from some guys on the football team, Riley throws their renewed relationship into jeopardy.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Riley will do anything to win Zane back. But when he violently overreacts to homophobic comments from some guys on the football team, Riley throws their renewed relationship into jeopardy.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Fiona, forced to relive the trauma of Bobby’s abuse, works with her therapist to learn to be her own hero. But when she can’t face the pain, she learns to cope instead—with champagne-- putting the fate of the school’s biggest event of the year in peril.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Fiona, forced to relive the trauma of Bobby’s abuse, works with her therapist to learn to be her own hero. But when she can’t face the pain, she learns to cope instead—with champagne-- putting the fate of the school’s biggest event of the year in peril.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Holly J convinces Simpson to ignore the PTA’s concerns about the council’s year-end event.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Holly J convinces Simpson to ignore the PTA’s concerns about the council’s year-end event – A Night in Vegas – by promising to keep it problem-free. But when conflicts brewing all semester reach a boiling point, Holly J can’t stop them from blowing up.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: Don't Let Me Get Me, Pt. 1
programme.desc: Alli dives into the new term determined to put her boiler room “bad girl” past behind her. But when a crackdown enforcing new rules and a dress code slams onto Degrassi, Alli finds herself in the eye of the storm – forced to confront her double life at home.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: Don't Let Me Get Me, Pt. 2
programme.desc: Alli dives into the new term determined to put her boiler room “bad girl” past behind her. But when a crackdown enforcing new rules and a dress code slams onto Degrassi, Alli finds herself in the eye of the storm – forced to confront her double life at home.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Declan returns for the Student Theatre Awards. Despite Holly J’s relationship with Sav, and Fiona’s warnings, Declan stops at nothing to win Holly J back. He thinks he’s succeeded… until he’s faced with a devastating thought -- he may have gone too far.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Declan returns for the Student Theatre Awards. Despite Holly J’s relationship with Sav, and Fiona’s warnings, Declan stops at nothing to win Holly J back. He thinks he’s succeeded… until he’s faced with a devastating thought -- he may have gone too far.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare is disillusioned with her parents after they decide to separate and she starts questioning her faith, including her decision to wait until after marriage for sex. When Eli rejects her, she wonders if he’s really over his dead ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare is disillusioned with her parents after they decide to separate and she starts questioning her faith, including her decision to wait until after marriage for sex. When Eli rejects her, she wonders if he’s really over his dead ex-girlfriend.
